acf.heading: Get a sertraline prescription online.
acf.first_paragraph: There’s many reasons for why you may be feeling anxious or depressed. Our doctors can help.

accordion.accordion_title: What is Zoloft (sertraline) and how does it work?
accordion.accordion_intro: Sertraline is an antidepressant which is typically used to help treat depression, OCD, anxiety, PTSD, and PMDD. It works by increasing the amount of serotonin in your brain which helps increase the feeling of “well-being”.

accordion.accordion_title: What are the uses for sertraline?
accordion.accordion_intro: Sertraline is a medication typically used to treat a variety of different mental health disorders including depression and anxiety. If you are experiencing depression, anxiety, OCD, PTSD. or PMDD, you can speak to a doctor on Maple and see if sertraline is right for you.
Sertraline should be used as a doctor recommends. Typical dosages are once daily and can come in both liquid and tablet form. Both of which should be taken in conjunction with another liquid.

accordion.accordion_title: What are the side effects and risks of sertraline?
accordion.accordion_intro: Sertraline may cause a loss of sexual desire as well as confusion, drowsiness, dryness around the mouth, and lack of energy. Sertraline may also contain ingredients which you may be allergic to.

accordion.accordion_title: What is the most important information I should know about sertraline?
accordion.accordion_intro: It is important not to consume alcohol while taking sertraline. This is because alcohol can not only make depression worse, but it can also increase the side effects associated with sertraline.
